name: Shop-Like - The Rogue-Like Item Shop Experience
name_original: Shop-Like - The Rogue-Like Item Shop Experience
description:
An Item-Shop Game meets the concept of roguelikes!
Endless Replayability and countless options to victory are awaiting you in Shop-Like!
Shop-Like is all about running a business in order to pay your debts, so you will not land in the brutal hands of debt slavery.

Variety of Strategy and Depth


Shop-Like offers a variety of play styles. You don't care about the quality of your sold items? Invest in Vending Machines and sell in quantities!

Do you want to serve your customers individually and exploit their unique traits and get them to pay 400% of the market price for your items? Analyze your customers and hand-pick the perfect item for them.

Reading the newspaper and don't like that the prices for Healing Potions went down? Have a talk with the media and convince them to put down the message, heck just strongarm them to create your own news and let the prices skyrocket!

Endless Replayability


Upgrades: Collect Random Upgrades that will make each run completely different. With over 50 different upgrades to raise your profits ranging from exploiting weak customers to being able to create masterful items.

Randomly Generated Customers: Each Customer is better or worse for your business. Some like red-colored items, and others are awfully good at haggling prices.

Mid-Game Crisis: Every run feels the same? Not in Shop-Like! Each run features a crisis that can flip your whole run into chaos!

Difficulties: Shop-Like features various difficulties in the form of different towns where you can try your luck. Unlock them one by one and try to beat them all as the challenge gets tougher and tougher.


Also: This game has tax evasion! How many games do you know that feature tax evasion???
